ThenActions.ActionName: CONFIG: set default export path here (without trailing slash)
CONFIG: optionally generate screen shots. (Boolean – set to true or false)

Actions.ActionName: Replace colon followed by space with " - "
Set "Macro_Export_Path" as child directory of export path
Go to first item in the group
Set "Macros_Total" to numbers of selected macros
If macro is disabled prepend "Name" with asterisks
Check if %Name% begins with a number in the "01)" format
If numbered append * aftert number ELSE prepend with *

ThenActions.ActionName: Using Keyboard Maestro's CLIPBOARDSEED() function to check when the clipboard’s contents changed
